WE THE UNDERSIGNED SUPPORT THE `ZERO TOLERANCE` THIS IF WORKS GIVE MORE SUPPORT TO THE VICTIMS OF MINOR CRIMES AND BREAK UP THE `GANGS` WHICH MAKE SOME AREAS A RISK TO GO DOWN, THIS MAY HAVE TO BE DONE `WITHOUT` POLICE CUTS ON THE FRONT LINE, THESE DAYS EACH OFFICER HAS HIS/HERS OWN VIEW ON A CRIME BEFORE THINKING OF DOING ANYTHINK ABOUT IT, SOME WILL SOME WILL NOT.
THIS IS NOT TO SAY WE KNOCK THE POLICE IN THE `RIOTS` AT ALL AS THEY ALL DID A `GREAT` JOB UNDER FIRE FROM THE `YOBS/THUGS` AS SEEN BY THE LACK OF REGARD TO ANYONE.
PLEASE SUPPORT THIS.
